first_para: Mary Theresa Glindon (born 13 January 1957 in Newcastle upon Tyne, Northumberland) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament for North Tyneside since 2010.

full.extract:
Mary Theresa Glindon (born 13 January 1957 in Newcastle upon Tyne, Northumberland) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament for North Tyneside since 2010.
^ http://www.london-gazette.co.uk/issues/59418/notices/1118281/
^ "Mary Glindon MP". BBC Democracy Live. BBC. Retrieved 25 July 2010. 
^ "Mary Glindon Biography". Retrieved 8 February 2013.
full.title: Mary Glindon
